channel.title: Using Black Mesa assets...?
channel.description:
Haven´t seen this question asked yet, so I´m asking it:
Is the community allowed to use Black Mesa assets (models/materials) when mapping for other source games, like cs :s (obviously giving credit to the Black Mesa developers)?
Thanks - LaBello
